definition:
Let $\phi$ be a planar dynamical system and $\gamma$ a curve. Then a
*contact point* of the curve and the dynamical system occurs when the
tangent vector of the curve is collinear to the vector of the dynamical
system. [@1]

[1]{} Khovanskiĭ, A.G.: Fewnomials. American Mathematical Society,
Providence, 1991.
